QuestData.Title: A Green Ogron?
QuestData.Description: Kaz always told me green ogron are bad.$b$bThe botani here have a green ogron and it is mean.$b$bIt was strong enough to take out my dad's entire hunting party.$b$bAre you strong enough to kill it?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: One of the more dangerous infested creatures in the botani arsenal.
QuestData.RewardText: Yay! Burn the bad guy! Burn him a lot!
